General.Name: JBF Industries Limited
General.Description: JBF Industries Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells polyester chips, and polyester and processed yarns in India and internationally. It offers textile and film grade polyester chips, bottle grade polyethylene terephthalate, fully draw and partially oriented yarns, and polyester textured yarn/sewing thread products. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is based in Mumbai, India.
